justification: Vendor 2 addresses device provisioning, authentication ('secure device onboarding'), configuration, maintenance, monitoring, and diagnostics across both centralized and edge contexts. Supported protocols and cited compliance standards enhance credibility. However, the response does not explicitly mention direct integration with Digital Twin environments, leaving some uncertainty regarding end-to-end functional parity with the stated requirement.
ability: The ability to provision and authenticate, configure, maintain, monitor and diagnose connected IoT devices operating as part of Digital Twin environment
